settings.title: Is your packaging discreet?
settings.text: Tabu packages are shipped in plain brown boxes with no exterior branding. We keep the excitement inside the box, just for you.

settings.title: How do I cancel my order?
settings.text: While we cannot make any guarantees, we do our best to honor cancelation requests within an hour after the order is placed. Orders cannot be canceled after they have shipped.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.text: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We will honor a refund minus the return shipping cost to your original form of payment within 120 days of delivery. We only ask that you share your feedback with us at support@heytabu.com. Please note shipping fees are non-refundable.

settings.title: There is a problem with the product I received, what do I do?
settings.text: If you believe there is an issue with your product, please contact us right away at support@heytabu.com. Our manufacturers adhere to strict quality standards, and we are committed to providing the best products possible.

settings.title: Can I purchase a new charging cable?
settings.text: Certainly, you can buy one here!

settings.title: How warm does the Nuri massager get?
settings.text: Our Nuri massager heats up to 97Â°f, which is just below your body's natural temperature. It should take about one minute to reach the maximum temperature.

settings.title: Do you offer a warranty on your products?
settings.text: Our massagers have a 1-year manufacturer warranty from the date of delivery. If you believe your massager is not operating as expected, please contact us at support@heytabu.com

settings.title: Are your massagers and lubricant safe for use during pregnancy?
settings.text: Please check with your physician before use to confirm the products are safe for you. Our lubricant and massager should not pose any risk if you are pregnant. However, the lubricant is pH balanced for women and therefore can be "unfriendly" to sperm, so we don't recommend it if you are trying to get pregnant.

settings.title: Do I need to purchase a charging cable?
settings.text: All kits and massagers include a charger in the package. If you believe your order was missing its charger, please send us a message at support@heytabu.com

settings.title: How much does shipping cost?
settings.text: Standard shipping is free within the contiguous United States, and expedited 2-day shipping is $18. Standard shipping to Alaska & Hawaii is $10-15 and we do not offer an expedited option to these locations.

settings.title: When will I receive my order?
settings.text:
Tabu cannot guarantee transit times or delivery dates. Below are the estimated transit times for orders after they have left our warehouse:

Standard shipping 5-10 days

Expedited shipping 2 days

settings.title: What carrier do you ship with?
settings.text: Carriers are selected based on their delivery performance to each location. Generally speaking, orders shipped with free Standard Shipping are delivered by USPS, and Express shipping are delivered by UPS.

settings.title: What products can I subscribe to?
settings.text: We currently offer a subscription to our lubricant.

settings.title: How often will my subscription ship?
settings.text: You can choose to have your subscriptions ship every 30 or 90 days. You can move your ship date sooner, push it later, or skip a shipment at any time.

settings.title: How can I cancel my subscription?
settings.text: You can cancel your subscription at any time from the account management page. Please send us a message at support@heytabu.com if we can provide any assistance.
